sourcesContent:
import {Component, inject} from '@angular/core'; import {FormBuilder, Validators} from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', template: `
CoinSplit

Create new Account

Already have an account? Sign in

`, styles: [ ] }) export class SignupComponent { signupForm= inject(FormBuilder).group({ fullname: ['',Validators.required, Validators.min(3)], email: ['',Validators.required,Validators.email], password:['',Validators.required,Validators.min(8),Validators.pattern('^(?=.*\\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\\W).+$')] }) signUp(){ console.log(this.signupForm.status) } }
